builds.name: Eternal Pack Leader
builds.concept: Summoner build using Eternal Flame to apply burn stacks that scale damage infinitely, combined with Embertail for ricochet fire spread and Eye of the Sun for mass detonation

memories.name: Sylvan Call

Eye of the Sun rains Solar Light on burning enemies every 20s, adding 9 burn stacks and dealing 360% Fire damage (massive synergy with Eternal Flame's per-stack scaling)

memories.rationale: Embertail adds ricochet fire damage and scales 8% per burning enemy. Clemency heals from hound damage. Fever causes burning enemies to explode after 2s dealing 130% Fire damage, with radius and damage scaling per burn stack (chain explosion loop with Eternal Flame)

memories.name: Blade Storm

builds.strategy: Sylvan Call with Eternal Flame applies burn curse through hounds, scaling damage infinitely with burn stacks. Eye of the Sun on the same memory triggers every 20 seconds, raining Solar Light on all burning enemies for 360% Fire damage and adding 9 burn stacks each, creating massive burst windows. Embertail on Moonlight Pact makes Fenrir's attacks ricochet fire, and Fever causes burning enemies to chain-explode with damage scaling per burn stack. The Eternal Flame + Eye of the Sun + Fever triple synergy creates a devastating loop: burns apply stacks, Eye of the Sun mass-adds 9 more stacks, and Fever detonates targets for escalating AoE explosions. Focus on maintaining maximum hound count while they spread burns. Each hound attack applies more burn stacks through Eternal Flame, and Embertail ricochets spread fire to additional targets.

Infinite damage scaling with burn stacks (2% per stack)
Eye of the Sun adds 9 burn stacks every 20s to ALL burning enemies
Fever explosions scale with burn stack count for devastating AoE
Overwhelming numbers advantage with hound army
weaknesses: Requires burn application for maximum effectiveness
Lower direct damage than DPS builds early on
Vulnerable to area-of-effect attacks on hounds
Requires time to build up hound army and burn stacks

builds.strategy: This build exploits three severely underused essences. Essence of Pain on Sylvan Call makes every hound attack splash 40% AoE damage to nearby enemies - with 5-7 hounds all splashing, this creates massive area damage. Paranoia on Moonlight Pact auto-casts Fenrir's leap attack whenever you take damage, with 60% cooldown reduction. Vengeance synergizes perfectly: when you take damage, you fire 2 retaliatory blades AND Moonlight Pact auto-casts AND your Memory damage increases by 34% for 5 seconds. This creates a damage-reactive loop where getting hit makes you stronger. Serpent's Blessing keeps hounds alive with its armor and healing buff. The Blade essence adds laceration damage for extra sustained DPS. Stand in the middle of enemies and let the reactive loop do its work while hounds splash AoE everywhere.
strengths: Essence of Pain 40% AoE splash on ALL hound damage (underused gem)
Paranoia + Vengeance damage-reactive loop (~18pt synergy)
Auto-casting reduces mechanical complexity
Taking damage makes you stronger (34% damage increase)
Massive area coverage from hound splash + Vengeance blades
weaknesses: Requires taking damage to activate reactive synergies
Less effective when enemies can't reach you
Hounds vulnerable to AoE damage
Needs careful health management to avoid dying

builds.strategy: Essence of the Wound is a completely unused essence that is devastating on a summoner. Each hound attack applies a Mark to the target. After 3 attacks on a marked enemy (which happens in about 1 second with multiple hounds), the Mark explodes for 275% AoE damage to all nearby enemies. With 5-7 hounds all attacking different targets, marks detonate constantly across the battlefield. Essence of Pain on the same memory makes all this damage (including explosions) splash an additional 40% AoE. Fenrir from Moonlight Pact detonates marks even faster with his 130% damage attacks. Domination + Fangs on Moonlight Pact adds infinite crit scaling. Love on Nature's Whisper increases hound attack speed, meaning marks detonate faster. The build creates a chain-reaction battlefield where hound attacks trigger 275% explosions that splash for another 40%.
strengths: Essence of the Wound 275% AoE explosions every 3 attacks (completely unused essence!)

Domination + Fangs crit scaling (18pt synergy)

Exceptional crowd clear through chain explosions

builds.strategy: This build exploits three underused dark damage essences. Essence of the Void on Sylvan Call makes every basic attack after casting explode for 150% Dark AoE - since you cast Sylvan Call frequently (Momentum + Efficiency), this triggers constantly. Twilight converts basic attacks to Dark damage and consumes dark stacks (3+) for massive burst (54% per stack + healing). Abyss on Moonlight Pact converts ALL Fenrir damage to Dark and triggers attack effects when hitting targets with 3+ dark stacks (20pt synergy with Twilight). Obsidian empowers your next attack after Moonlight Pact cast for 250% Dark Damage. Dusk fires 2 Dark shards per attack for 5s, rapidly building dark stacks. The gameplay loop: cast a memory -> Void empowers next attack for 150% Dark AoE -> attack to consume dark stacks with Twilight -> Obsidian adds 250% Dark -> repeat. Hounds and Fenrir build dark stacks while you detonate them.
strengths: Twilight + Abyss dark stack synergy (20pt synergy)
Essence of the Void 150% Dark AoE after every cast (unused essence!)
Obsidian adds 250% Dark empowered attacks
Dark stack building + consumption creates burst cycle
Dusk adds sustained dark shard output
weaknesses: Complex cast-attack-consume rotation
Requires dark stack management
Less effective against dark-resistant enemies
Hounds vulnerable to AoE damage
